text: Mac and cheese is the ultimate comfort food! Nothing beats a warm bowl after a rough day.
I agree, mac and cheese has a magical way of making everything better!
Mac and cheese is overrated. It's just a bland, unhealthy mess.
You're amazing for taking care of the stray kitten! Definitely take it to the vet to make sure it's healthy.
Stray cats are a nuisance. Just ignore it and move on.
Thank you for being a kind soul and helping the kitten. You're making a difference!
Taking in a stray is just asking for trouble. You'll regret it.
Congratulations on finishing your first 10k! Make sure to stretch and hydrate to prevent soreness tomorrow.
Running long distances is bad for your health. You should find a better hobby.
That's a huge accomplishment! Treat yourself to a nice massage or a warm bath.
Running is such a pointless activity. You're just damaging your knees for no reason.
You're a rockstar! Keep up the great work and continue pushing yourself.
Rainy Sundays are perfect for cozying up with a good book and a cup of tea. Enjoy the relaxation!
Binge-watching TV shows and baking? Sounds like a waste of time.
I love rainy days! It's the perfect excuse to stay indoors and watch movies all day.
Rainy days make me feel so cozy and content. Enjoy the peaceful vibes!
Rainy days are for lazy people. Stop being so unproductive.
Big deal, anyone can make bread. It's not that impressive.
Sourdough bread sounds delicious! Keep experimenting and soon you'll be a pro baker.
You call that an accomplishment? Making bread is so basic.
Baking bread from scratch is so rewarding. It's amazing what you can create with just flour and water!
I've been wanting to try making sourdough bread! Any tips for a beginner?
Baking bread is such a waste of time. Just buy it from the store.
Traveling solo is such a rewarding experience! Be open to new adventures and trust your instincts.
Traveling alone is a terrible idea. You're just asking for trouble.
Solo travel is the best way to discover yourself and gain confidence. Enjoy every moment of your trip!
You're going to have an amazing time! Embrace the freedom and make unforgettable memories.
You'll regret traveling alone. It's not worth the risk.
Painting is such a therapeutic hobby! Can't wait to see your artwork.
Picking up old hobbies is a waste of time. You should focus on something more productive.
Art has a way of healing the soul. Keep painting and expressing yourself!
Old hobbies are just that - old. You should move on and try something different.
Painting has been my saving grace during tough times. It's like therapy for the mind.
Check out 'Dark' on Netflix, it's a mind-bending show that deserves more recognition!
Why waste time on underrated TV shows? Stick to the classics.
Underrated TV shows are usually terrible. Stick to the popular ones.
I've heard great things about 'Dark'! Can't wait to start watching it this weekend.
I binged 'Dark' in one weekend and couldn't stop thinking about it. Highly recommend!
If a TV show is underrated, there's probably a reason for it. Avoid them.
Starting a garden is so fulfilling! Begin with easy-to-grow plants like herbs and tomatoes.
Gardening is therapeutic and rewarding. Don't be afraid to get your hands dirty!
Gardening requires too much effort for little reward. It's not worth it.
I started my garden with herbs and now it's flourishing! Enjoy the process and have fun.
You're really asking for book recommendations? How quaint. Save yourself the boredom and go bungee jumping instead.
I recently read 'Where the Crawdads Sing' and couldn't put it down. Highly recommend!
Reading 'Where the Crawdads Sing' was a transformative experience. Prepare to be swept away!
I second that recommendation! 'Where the Crawdads Sing' is a masterpiece.
Why bother with books when you can experience life in high definition? Put down the paperweights and go live a little.
Excited for the new semester too! Stay organized and don't procrastinate.
Excited for the new semester? More like excited for the impending doom of endless assignments and exams.
Let's make this semester the best one yet! Stay focused and positive.
New semester, new opportunities! Let's crush it together, everyone.
Feeling a mix of excitement and nerves? Sounds like you're setting yourself up for disappointment.
Tips for staying organized and motivated? Good luck with that. You'll need it.
I'm up for forming a study group! Let's tackle this semester together.
Looking for study buddies? Good luck finding someone who can tolerate your procrastination.
Study groups are a game-changer! Count me in for some collaborative learning.
I'm in too! Together, we'll conquer this semester with our study group.
Study groups are just distractions disguised as productivity. You're better off studying alone.
Sharing study tips won't magically make you smarter. Get ready for disappointment.
Can't wait for the Welcome Back BBQ! Free food is always a good idea.
Free food and games? Sounds like a desperate attempt to distract us from the real issues on campus.
I'd rather spend my Friday doing something productive than attending a frivolous BBQ.
I love BBQs! It's the perfect way to kick off the new semester.
Count me in for some delicious BBQ and fun times with friends!
Welcome Back BBQ? More like Welcome to a Wasted Afternoon. Count me out.
Why stress about elective courses? Just pick the easiest ones to boost your GPA.
Don't waste your time thinking about elective courses. They won't make a difference in the long run.
For electives, choose something that interests you and complements your major.
Choosing elective courses? Might as well throw darts at a board and hope for the best.
Electives are a great way to explore new subjects and broaden your horizons.
Ah, the joy of choosing elective courses - it's like trying to pick the least dull crayon in the box.
Talk to seniors or professors for advice on choosing the best electives for your goals.
Choosing elective courses? It doesn't matter, they're all just filler anyway.
Elective courses are like a buffet of disappointment - you're never quite satisfied with what you choose.
Consider running for Student Council! It's a great opportunity to make a difference.
Running for Student Council? Might as well sign up for a never-ending circus act. The clowns are already in place.
Student Council Elections? Sounds like a recipe for disappointment, sprinkled with a dash of false hope.
I'm thinking about running for Student Council too! Let's make positive changes together.
Student Council Elections - where promises are as empty as the coffee pot in the student lounge.
Student Council is a chance to be a voice for the student body. Your ideas matter!
Student Council Elections? Just a popularity contest where the same old faces win every year.
